mapper.insert: insert into tbl_Contents_Review (Contents_ID, Member_ID, Member_Name, Contents_Review_Title, Contents_Review, Contents_Review_Rating) values (#{contentsID}, #{memberID}, #{memberName}, #{contentsReviewTitle}, #{contentsReview}, #{contentsReviewRating})
mapper.select: select Member_ID memberID, Member_Name memberName, Contents_Review_ID contentsReviewID, Contents_Review_Title contentsReviewTitle, Contents_Review contentsReview, Contents_Review_Rating contentsReviewRating, Updated updatedDate from tbl_Contents_Review where Contents_ID = #{contentsID} order by Contents_Review_ID desc limit #{cri.startNum}, #{cri.contentsPerPage}
select count(Contents_ID) from tbl_Contents_Review where Contents_ID = #{contentsID}
select Contents_ID from tbl_Contents_Review where Contents_Review_ID = #{contentsReviewID}

select Review_Picture_Name from tbl_Review_Attachment
where Contents_Review_ID = #{reviewID}
